channel.title: Aspects of mental health
channel.description:
A documentary series on the role of behavioral sciences and medical research.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Safeguards against mental illness
item.description: This program focuses on safeguards against mental illness. Guest are Paul Dudley White, M.D., Boston, Mass.; and Leonard J. Duhl, M.D.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Research on mental illness
item.description: This program focuses on researching mental illness. Guests are John C. Whitehorn, M.D.; Don D. Jackson, M.D., Palo Alto, California; Robert H. Felix, M.D.; Harry Levinson, Ph.D.; and Edith Weigert, M.D.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: What is mental health?
item.description: This program seeks a definition of mental health. Guests include Lawrence Kolb, M.D., Columbia University; and Harry Levinson, Ph.D., Menninger Foundation, Topeka, Kansas.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Community and mental health
item.description: This program focuses on the community and mental health. Guests are Lawrence Kolb, M.D.; and Leonard J. Duhl, M.D.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: New approaches to mental health
item.description: This program focuses on new approaches to mental health. Guests are Edith Weigert, M.D., Chevy Chase, Md.; Robert H. Felix, M.D., National Institute of Mental Health; Lawrence Kolb, M.D., Harry Levinson, Ph.D.; and John C. Whitehorn, M.D.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Biochemistry and mental health
item.description: This program focuses on biochemistry and mental health. Guest are Jerome T. Syverton, M.D.; John F. Enders, M.D.; Joseph Hill, M.D.; John Kinross-Wright, M.D.; Roger Mitchell, M.D.; Harry Kalven, Jr., M.D.; Leonard J. Duhl, M.D.; and others.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Mental health and manpower
item.description: This program focuses on mental health and manpower. Guest is George W. Albee, Ph.D., Western Reserve University, Cleveland, Ohio.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health
